name: Interaural Differences
description:
This game was made from scratch in <48 hours for Ludum Dare 41 (my first). The theme is "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

The game is a sort of abstract twin-stick puzzle shooter thing. It features some original music that might be considered incompatible, though I have a hard time imagining that any genres could really be incompatible.

For best results, please play the standalone with a game controller. I've tested it with PS4 and Xbox360 controllers.

I have not tested the Windows and Linux builds.
